original_text: When some people came along the road, they saw the dead body as it lay there. The lion was standing beside the body. The people went back to Bethel, the city where the old prophet lived. They reported what they had seen on the road.
korean_text: 지나가는 사람들이 길에 버린 시체와 그 시체 곁에 선 사자를 보고 그 늙은 선지자가 사는 성읍에 가서 말한지라

sentences.original_text: When some people came along the road
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들이 길을 따라 올 때

sentences.original_text: The lion was standing beside the body
The people went back to Bethel
the city where the old prophet lived
They reported what they had seen
